main event: A young witness reported seeing a large, very bright object in the sky over Richfield, Idaho on July 3, 1960.
interesting points: The witness waited almost a year before reporting the sighting, and was the only one among the reported group of people watching the object who reported it.
The object was described as large and very bright.
The witnesses were likely watching the planet Venus during its last minutes prior to setting.
The sighting lasted for about 15 minutes.
The form instructs the observer to provide a detailed description of the event and any additional information or sketches they believe are important.
photographs: yes, the report indicates photographs were taken
